    • moveCurrentPlayerToSpace

      public void moveCurrentPlayerToSpace​(@NotNull Space space)
      This is just some dummy controller operation to make a simple move to see something happening on the board. This method should eventually be deleted!
      Parameters:
      space - the space to which the current player should move

    • executeCommandOptionContinue

      public void executeCommandOptionContinue​(@NotNull Command option)
      This method is in charge of executing the interactive command-cards by bringing the program back to the activation phase. And afterwords, the program continues once again until the interactive command-cards occurs.
      Parameters:
      option - is the direction (left or right).

      public void saveOrUpdateGame()
